news.title: China vows to retaliate as necessary after Trump threatens another 10% tariff hike
news.summary: China's statement on Friday appeared to strike a stronger tone than its response after Washington slapped the initial 10% duties earlier this month. China's statement appeared to be in response to Washington's response to the initial duties.

news.title: Trump says a minerals deal with Ukraine is worth billions. It might not be as valuable as he hopes
news.summary: Analysts question the size of Ukraine's natural resources deposits, how accessible they are and easy to extract. Analysts questions the ultimate value of a potential deal.

news.title: Google announces layoffs in its HR, cloud units as part of ongoing cost cuts
news.summary: The company has begun cutting from units in order to invest more in AI. The company has also announced it will be selling off some of its non-core businesses to focus on AI.

news.title: Nvidia bounced from the $3 trillion market cap club after shares fall more than 8%
news.summary: Nvidia is still the second most valuable U.S. tech company, behind Apple and ahead of Microsoft. Despite its slide, Nvidia still has a market value of more than $20 billion.

news.title: Egg prices are threatening a classic holiday tradition: Easter dye kits
news.summary: Makers of Easter egg dye kits are bracing for the potential fallout if the egg shortage doesn't begin to clear up before the April 20 holiday.

news.title: Applebee’s ‘underwhelming’ $9.99 meal deal draws downgrade for Dine Brands
news.summary: Analyst cuts Dine Brands to neutral after the ‘Really Big Meal Deal’ offers value but doesn’t improve same-store sales at Applebee’s.

news.title: Oil prices on track for February losses on worries over tariffs, economic outlook
news.summary: Oil futures fell Friday and were on track for a monthly loss. Crude saw pressure in February on worries about the global economic outlook and rising trade tensions from the Trump administration's tariff plans.

news.title: How U.S. ‘mini-stagflation’ and the yen could shock financial markets
news.summary: A financial shock is on the cards if the carry trade crumbles, says strategist. The carry trade is a way for investors to make money from the stock market.

news.title: These tips for investing in mutual funds and ETFs put you in the driver’s seat
news.summary: Warren Buffett talks about the stock market, and a potential successor to the “Magnificent Seven’s” stocks. Plus: What Warren Buffett really thinks about the Stock Market.

news.title: ‘She’s not working outside the home’: My mother, 63, inherited $100,000. Is she too old to invest in the stock market?
news.summary: "Are the only options to create a CD ladder or leave it in a high-interest savings account?” asks the expert. “Are theonly options to created a CD Ladder or leave It in a High-interest Savings Account?’ asks the Expert.
